page.title: 05Surrey Docks city farm.
page.content: At surrey Docks farm there are animals but it is not a farm where they plough fields. The farm is in what was once Surrey Docks,next to the River Thames It is a city farm The farm is 10 years old (it was started in 1975.) The farm is just over an acre.It was set up so that people who live in cities can see what a farm is like.There are these animals on the farm :11 geese, 24 goats 50 hens, 2 donkeys, 6 ducks, 2 pigs,2 sheeps , and 5 rabbits . There is a stoney hill.it has a little pond where the ducks are. The chickens are put away at night because the fox might eat them. The geese do not have to be put away because they stay close together. They sell their produce which is meat, eggs, goats milk, youhurt and soft cheese.
